sentence.Network_en: The fertility of women who smoke is half that of non-smoking women.
sentence.Network_cn: 吸烟女士的生育能力是不吸烟女士的一半。

sentence.Network_en: A green manure is a crop grown mainly to improve soil fertility.
sentence.Network_cn: 种植绿肥作物主要是为使土壤更加肥沃.

sentence.Network_en: She is taking drugs to increase her fertility.
sentence.Network_cn: 她为了增强她的生殖能力而在服药.

entry.def: Land or soil that is fertile is able to support the growth of a large number of strong healthy plants.

example.ex: ...the rolling fertile countryside of East Cork.
example.tran: 科克郡东部起伏的乡间沃土

entry.def: A fertile mind or imagination is able to produce a lot of good, original ideas.

example.tran: 弗林丰富想象力的产物

example.ex: A chess player must have a fertile imagination and rich sense of fantasy.
example.tran: 一个棋手必须有丰富的想象力，并善于奇思妙想。

entry.tran: (环境或条件)易于…的，有助于…的，适于…的
entry.def: A situation or environment that is fertile in relation to a particular activity or feeling encourages the activity or feeling.

example.ex: ...a fertile breeding ground for this kind of violent racism.
example.tran: 易于滋生这种极端种族主义的温床

entry.def: A person or animal that is fertile is able to reproduce and have babies or young.

example.ex: The operation cannot be reversed to make her fertile again.
example.tran: 手术结果不可逆转，无法让她恢复生育能力。

means.word_mean: 1. the ratio of live births in an area to the population of that area; expressed per 1000 population per year
2. the state of being fertile; capable of producing offspring
3. the property of producing abundantly and sustaining growth;

sentences.sentence: "he praised the richness of the soil"

auth_sentence.content: But this fertility dance has come at a price.
auth_sentence.res_content: But this fertility dance has come at a price.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But this fertility dance has come at a price.

auth_sentence.content: Fertility-finance companies say the industry will continue to thrive.

auth_sentence.content: The fertility of Egypt supplied the dearth of Arabia.
auth_sentence.res_content: The fertility of Egypt supplied the dearth of Arabia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The fertility of Egypt supplied the dearth of Arabia.

offer[v.提供,提议,出现 n.出价,提议,意图]+ing表名词→n.报盘,提供的货物

Sentence.sentence: No one has a good answer" as to why fertility varies among countries, says sociologist Andrew Cherl in of The Johns Hopkins University.
By some studies, the safety nets for retirees have reduced fertility rates by
And if fertility in ageing countries does not pick up?

sentences.en: A green manure is a crop grown mainly to improve soil fertility.
sentences.cn: 种植绿肥作物主要是为使土壤更加肥沃。

sentences.en: The villagers took fertility symbols into the fields to ensure a good harvest.
sentences.cn: 农民们把丰产象征物拿到田里以确保好收成。

sentences.en: She is taking drugs to increase her fertility.
sentences.cn: 她为了增强她的生殖能力而在服药。

sentences.en: She was unable to conceive a child naturally and was offered fertility treatment.
sentences.cn: 她因不能自然怀孕而接受受孕治疗。
